incidents.name: Some Voice Recordings Stuck in Processing

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting some voice recordings that were stuck in processing has been resolved and the service is functioning normally at this time.

We have started seeing recovery for some voice recordings that were stuck in processing. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing some voice recordings stuck in processing. We are currently working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with some voice recordings for accounts with Marketplace AddOns enabled stuck in processing. . Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Flex and Task Router Workers Experiencing Issues Handling Tasks

incident_updates.body: On February 19th, from approximately 9:00 AM to 9:10 AM and 12:00 PM to 12:26 PM PST, we experienced issues with Flex and Task Router. Customers may have noticed increased latency as well as Agents having issues accepting or interacting with Tasks and Invites. This issue has been mitigated.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Flex Notification Platform. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue with Trust Hub URL's Redirecting to A2P Overview in Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the issue affecting the links for the Trust Hub in the Twilio Console, triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Trust Hub URL's Redirecting to A2P Overview in Twilio Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
